definition: filial piety (a Confucian obligation)/respect and obedience to one's parents

sentences.english: Here are some suggestions of things to get your mom for Mother's day.
sentences.chinese: 下面有些小提示可以幫你在母親節盡表孝心。
凱瑟琳由於出於孝心而有所顧慮，這我們應當尊重。

sentences.english: Since you are so kind, buy you to Wal fu as a workman.
sentences.chinese: 念你一片孝心，就買就到華府做工。

sentences.english: For the son of man should know filial piety, is an undefeated flower.
sentences.chinese: 爲人子應知孝敬，孝心是一朵不敗的花。

sentences.english: I believe his filial piety and ability.
sentences.chinese: 我相信卡爾的孝心和實力。

sentences.english: The filial piety youth story made us cry.
sentences.chinese: 孝心少年的故事讓我們動容落淚。

definition: filial/dutiful/devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc)/to show filial piety towards (an older family member)/filial piety
filial piety (Confucian virtue)/to be a good son or daughter
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
to show filial respect/to give presents (to one's elders or superiors)/to support one's aged parents
to show concern and care for
respect the old and cherish the young
to recall fondly/to remember with emotion
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
